item.title: "That's A Big Step For Him": How Sonic The Hedgehog 3 Sees The Titular Hero Grow Explained By Ben Schwartz
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: Ben Schwartz discusses Sonic's growth in Sonic the Hedgehog 3 as the titular hero evolves into a selfless leader alongside his team.

item.title: Amy Adams’ 2024 Horror-Comedy Movie Gets Streaming Release Date
item.description: Amy Adams is an actor who can excel in any genre, which she has proven once again in her 2024 horror-comedy that will soon be available to stream.

item.title: “I Hate Everything About This”: Daniel Craig’s $1.1B James Bond Sequel Gets Scathing Review From VFX Artists For 1 Key Scene
item.description: VFX artists share a passionate break-down of one of Daniel Craig's most beloved James Bond movies, explaining a mishandled special effects moment.
